title: DataSHIELD Workshop
text:
Introduction
This website hosts the materials and exercises for the DataSHIELD workshop at the Institut Català d’Oncologia (ICO).
On it you will find reading materials, setup tutorials, workshop indications and practical exercises.

title: DataSHIELD Workshop
text:
Getting Started
All practical exercises will be conducted using the public Opal demo server. This server provides a fully functional DataSHIELD environment with sample datasets that workshop participants can use to replicate the examples.
Login credentials for the demo server are:

Username: dsuser
Password: p@ssw0rd

title: DataSHIELD Workshop
text:
Credits
Material developed at the Bioinformatics Research Group in Epidemiology (BRGE) of the Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal) by Juan R González and David Sarrat González.

title: dsOMOP COPD Example
text:
Libraries

library(DSI)
library(DSOpal)
library(dsBaseClient)
library(dsOMOPClient)
library(dsOMOPHelper)



Connection

builder <- newDSLoginBuilder()
builder$append(server="opal-demo",
              url="https://opal-demo.obiba.org/",
              user="administrator",
              password="password",
              driver = "OpalDriver",
              profile = "omop")

logindata <- builder$build()
conns <- datashield.login(logins=logindata)


Logging into the collaborating servers




Setup

o <- ds.omop.helper(
    connections = conns,
    resource = "omop_demo.mimiciv", 
    symbol = "mimiciv"
)



Data retrieval

# Define concept IDs
concepts <- list(
    outcome = 255573,      # Chronic obstructive lung diease (condition)
    predictor1 = 4005823,  # Tobacco use (observation)
    predictor2 = 317009    # Asthma (condition)
)

# Get data
o$auto(
    table = "condition_occurrence", 
    concepts = c(concepts$outcome, concepts$predictor2),
    columns = c("condition_occurrence_id")
)

o$auto(
    table = "observation", 
    concepts = concepts$predictor1,
    columns = c("observation_id")
)



Data preparation

# Convert variables to boolean
for (var in c("tobacco_user", "asthma", "chronic_obstructive_lung_disease")) {
    id_type <- if(var == "tobacco_user") "observation_id" else "condition_occurrence_id"
    full_var <- paste0("mimiciv$", var, ".", id_type)
    
    # Convert to numeric
    ds.asNumeric(x.name = full_var, newobj = paste0(var, "_num"), datasources = conns)
    
    # Convert to boolean
    ds.Boole(V1 = paste0(var, "_num"), V2 = 0, Boolean.operator = "!=", 
             numeric.output = TRUE, na.assign = 0, newobj = var)
}

# Create analysis table
ds.cbind(
    x = c("chronic_obstructive_lung_disease", "tobacco_user", "asthma"),
    DataSHIELD.checks = FALSE,
    newobj = "analysis_table",
    datasources = conns
)

$is.object.created
[1] "A data object <analysis_table> has been created in all specified data sources"

$validity.check
[1] "<analysis_table> appears valid in all sources"




Analysis

model <- ds.glm(
    formula = "chronic_obstructive_lung_disease ~ tobacco_user + asthma", 
    data = "analysis_table", 
    family = "binomial"
)
